title: Directorate's Iron Return
outcome: The Directorate declares a state of emergency and partially reactivates the BCI in restricted mode, imposing curfews and rationing via restored electronic passes. Stability returns to some degree, but resentment grows as surveillance and arbitrary restrictions make daily life unpredictable. Oksana and Sven argue over the wisdom of harsh control while the populace quietly adapts, resists, or schemes under the renewed regime.

events.description: Directorate forces deploy citywide, reinstituting ration checkpoints and a nighttime curfew enforced through partially restored BCI scoring.
Oksana and Sven clash during a stormy Council session about the state-of-emergency decree. Oksana warns of repeating past mistakes, while Sven pleads for ordered transition.
Columns of citizens are seen waiting at checkpoints, frustrated by arbitrary BCI blocks on resources and movement; street murmurs of rebellion surface in multiple districts.
Reports of sabotage circulate as Directorate officials discover false BCI status updates spread by small tech cells, undermining pass system integrity.
A public address from Sven promises a timeline for restoring civil rule, but many citizens quietly seek alternative structures as tension between order and freedom intensifies.
